metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20261 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
A race condition was found in the Linux kernels implementation of thefloppy disk drive controller driver software. The impact of this issue islessened by the fact that the default permissions on the floppy device(/dev/fd0) are restricted to root. If the permissions on the device havechanged the impact changes greatly. In the default configuration root (orequivalent) permissions are required to attack this flaw.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-20261` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-208-generic - 4.4.0-208.240~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-208-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-208.240~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-208-lowlatency - 4.4.0-208.240~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-208-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-208.240~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-208-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-208.240~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-208-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-208.240~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-208-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-208.240~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-208-generic - 4.4.0-208.240~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-208-lowlatency - 4.4.0-208.240~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1090-aws - 4.4.0-1090.94
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-208.240~14.04.1').
linux-aws package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1090.94').
linux-azure: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
